CustomField.description: Method of paginating through survey questions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the preferred navigation style for the survey response interface: No Pagination: Participants can view and respond to all the questions on a single page. Question: Participants can view and respond to one question at a time, navigating through the survey using previous and next buttons. Section: Participants can view and respond to all questions within a section at a time, navigating through the survey using previous and next buttons. Select the option that best suits survey format.
CustomField.label: Pagination
